patient_visible_data.chief_complaint: Intermittent sternal chest pain x 2 weeks
patient_visible_data.presenting_symptoms: Dull, squeezing sternal chest pain rated 7-9/10. Unrelieved by antacids. No radiation. Worse with eating.

environment_hidden_data.clinical_context: High risk patient (smoker, age, HTN) with atypical but concerning symptoms. Resting ECG has T-wave inversions V2-V4.

intended_request.clinical_indication: Risk stratification for atypical chest pain in patient with multiple cardiac risk factors (smoking, HTN, age). Baseline ECG shows T-wave inversions.
